Detailed Description

Interface Class to Activity

include "litesql.hpp" include "pomotuxdatabase.hpp" -llitesql

Interface class to the one automatically generated by LiteSQL.

See also:
pomotuxdatabase.hpp

void IActivity::set_mDeadline ( int  date  )
